scenes.name: the flame scepter
scenes.description:
Inexpicably hovering in the air before you, a staff with a glowing orange orb in its head appears. 
Inside the orb, almost like a snowglobe of energy, fire seems to dance and swirl.
 - take 
 - leave

scenes.name: take
scenes.description:
You reach out your hand, and the flame scepter floats straight into it. 
You sense that the scepter must hold a great mystical power. 
 - exit
